com.facebook.collections

Class CounterMap<K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.collections.CounterMap<K>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - key type for the map
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Map.Entry<K,Long>>

    public class CounterMap<K>
extends Object
implements Iterable<Map.Entry<K,Long>>
    maps keys of type K to a long. Thread-safe and cleans up keys when the count reaches 0

      CounterMap()

      • CounterMap

        public CounterMap()

    • Method Detail

      • addAndGet

        public long addAndGet(K key,
             long delta)
        adds a value to key; will create a counter if it doesn't exist already. conversely, since 0 is the value returned for keys not present, if the counter value reaches 0, it is removed
        Parameters:
        key - - key to add the delta to
        delta - - positive/negative amount to increment a counter
        Returns:
        the new value after updating

      • getAndAdd

        public long getAndAdd(K key,
             long delta)
        adds a value to key; will create a counter if it doesn't exist already. conversely, since 0 is the value returned for keys not present, if the counter value reaches 0, it is removed
        Parameters:
        key - - key to add the delta to
        delta - - positive/negative amount to increment a counter
        Returns:
        the old value before updating

      • remove

        public AtomicLong remove(K key)
        Parameters:
        key -
        Returns:
        value removed if present, null otherwise

      • get

        public long get(K key)
        Parameters:
        key -
        Returns:
        value of a counter. Returns 0 if not present
